name: Afternoon's Souvenirs
description:
A small platformer. (a bit tricky)

  • Move: A/D or Left/Right
  • Jump: W or Up or Space
  • Make Checkpoint: Enter
  • Goto Checkpoint: Hold R
  • Cousin Mode(Easier): Hold E
  • Reset Game: Backspace

Everything was made from one block object, backgrounds are photos I took.

Contains exactly one secret item. 

(Tip: Once you find the big checkpoints, you can always access them anytime, so feel free to try again another day if you are stuck!)

Music from Nintendo's Stunt Race FX, pieced together by LuigiBlood

www.youtube.com/watch?v=sTdpUCWXuwI

I don't own the music

Prototype Here (ps: haha)
